Example

What is the value of \(\displaystyle1+\frac14+\frac1{16}+\frac1{64}+\cdots\)?

Solution

As we noted earlier, this is the geometric series with \(a=1\) and \(r=\frac14\). So using the formula, \[ 1+\frac14+\frac1{16}+\frac1{64}+\cdots = \frac{a}{1-r} = \frac{1}{1-\tfrac14} = \frac{4}{3}. \] In particular, notice that this means the shaded area in the picture above is \(\frac13\) of the total area.
